mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_NAME, I.SPEC, I.UNIT_CODE, C.CODE AS UNIT_NAME FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON I.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE I.ITEM_TYPE = '완제품' ORDER BY I.ITEM_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOM_HEADER ( BOM_HEADER_ID, ITEM_ID, VERSION, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{bomCode}, #{itemId}, #{version}, #{description}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO BOM_DETAIL ( DETAIL_ID, BOM_HEADER_ID, CHILD_ID, QUANTITY, PRICE, LOSS_RATE ) VALUES ( BOM_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bomCode}, #{childId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{lossRate} )
mapper.select: SELECT H.BOM_HEADER_ID AS bomCode, I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_TYPE, I.ITEM_CAT_L, I.ITEM_CAT_S, I.UNIT_CODE, C.CODE AS UNIT_NAME, I.SPEC, I.REMARK FROM BOM_HEADER H JOIN ITEM I ON H.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON I.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE I.ITEM_TYPE = '완제품'

SELECT B.BOM_HEADER_ID AS bomCode, A.ITEM_CODE AS materialCode, A.ITEM_NAME AS materialName, A.SPEC AS spec, C.CODE AS unitName, A.PRICE AS price, B.QUANTITY AS quantity FROM BOM_DETAIL B JOIN ITEM A ON B.CHILD_ID = A.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON A.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE A.ITEM_TYPE = '원자재'

SELECT H.BOM_HEADER_ID AS bomCode, I.ITEM_CODE AS productCode, I.ITEM_NAME AS productName, I.SPEC, CC.CODE_DESC AS unitName FROM BOM_HEADER H JOIN ITEM I ON H.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON I.UNIT_CODE = CC.CODE_ID AND CC.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE H.BOM_HEADER_ID = #{bomCode}

SELECT B.BOM_HEADER_ID AS bomCode, CI.ITEM_CODE AS materialCode, CI.ITEM_NAME AS materialName, CI.SPEC AS spec, CC.CODE_DESC AS unitName, CI.PRICE AS price, B.QUANTITY AS quantity FROM BOM_DETAIL B JOIN ITEM CI ON B.CHILD_ID = CI.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CI.UNIT_CODE = CC.CODE_ID AND CC.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE B.BOM_HEADER_ID = #{bomCode}

SELECT H.BOM_HEADER_ID AS bomCode, I.ITEM_CODE AS productCode, I.ITEM_NAME AS productName, C.ITEM_CODE AS materialCode, C.ITEM_NAME AS materialName, C.SPEC AS spec, CC.CODE AS unitUnicode, CC.CODE_DESC AS unitName2, D.PRICE AS price, D.QUANTITY AS quantity, h. mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOM_DETAIL ( BOM_HEADER_ID, CHILD_ID, QUANTITY, PRICE ) VALUES ( #{bomHeaderId}, (SELECT ITEM_ID FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{materialCode}), #{quantity}, #{price} )
